Title: Stop Saying Lice!
Writer: Dan Levy, Eugene Levy (created by), Dan Levy (created by), Matt Kippen (executive story editor), Monica Heisey (story editor), Ally Pankiw (story editor), Zoe Whittall (story editor)
Actors: Eugene Levy, Catherine O'Hara, Dan Levy, Annie Murphy
Plot: A lice outbreak at the school has possibly made its way back to the motel via Alexis, who, horrified, definitely is stricken with a case of it. Alexis has to deal with it, but embarrassed ...
